outcome: Internal sabotage reveals systemic flaws, leading to power shifts within the Council.

events.description: Discovery of an internal foolproof mechanism failure that leaves citizens without valid BCI scores, affecting access to essentials.
A faction within the Council leaks an exhaustive report on the vulnerability of the BCI system, shaking internal trust.
Disagreement erupts within the Council as the Directorate and the Innovators clash over control of system corrections.
Interim Council leader declares a restructuring of BCI management, aiming to stabilize the compromised system.
